sentences.en: Another possible way to control juvenile - onset diabetes is the pancreas transplant.
sentences.cn: 控制少年期糖尿病的另一种可行的方法是胰腺移植.

sentences.en: At the onset of germination, the hypocotyl elongates rapidly by cell enlargement.
sentences.cn: 萌发开始时, 下胚轴依靠细胞增大而迅速伸长.

sentences.en: Bleeding and diarrhea signal the onset of symptoms.
sentences.cn: 出血和腹泻意味着症状的发作.

sentences.en: He went to see a doctor at the onset of a fever.
sentences.cn: 他开始发烧时便去看医生了.

sentences.en: Most of the passes have been closed with the onset of winter.
sentences.cn: 冬天来临，大部分关口均已关闭。

sentences.en: Our troops withstood the onset of the enemy.
sentences.cn: 我们的部队抵挡住了敌人的进攻.

sentences.en: The drug must be taken from the onset of the infection.
sentences.cn: 这种药必须在感染的最初期就开始服用.

sentences.en: The onset is usually gradual and associated with anorexia, lethargy.
sentences.cn: 通常起病渐进,伴有厌食, 昏睡.

sentences.en: The onset of depression often follows a traumatic event.
sentences.cn: 抑郁症发作常常发生在遭受创伤之后.

sentences.en: The soil steadily dries out until the onset of the autumn rains.
sentences.cn: 在秋季雨季来临之前,土壤逐渐干旱.

sentences.en: The sudden onset of winter caused havoc with rail and air transport.
sentences.cn: 冬天的突然降临让铁路和航空运输系统陷入混乱。

sentences.en: There'll come no good of him in such an onset.
sentences.cn: 这种场合他留下来毫无好处.

sentences.en: Together we had watched the advance and onset of world disaster.
sentences.cn: 我们曾一同注意观察世界灾难的发生和发展.

sentences.en: We already knew that walking can reduce adult - onset diabetes and coronary heart disease.
sentences.cn: 我们已知道,散步能降低成人患糖尿病和冠心病的机会.

sentences.en: With the onset of war, oil prices climbed past $30 a barrel.
sentences.cn: 战争一爆发，油价就攀过了每桶30美元。

trans.tran_cn: 攻击，袭击，开始，动手，[医]发病
trans.tran_en: the beginning of something, especially something bad
